statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value';
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value' AND preference_2 = 'value';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(preference_1) FROM CustomerPreferences GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%value%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 IS NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences OFFSET 5;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 100;
SELECT preference_1, COUNT(*) AS preference_count FROM CustomerPreferences GROUP BY preference_1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value' OR preference_2 = 'value';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_2 = 'value';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_3 IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%keyword%';
SELECT customer_id, preference_3 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 = preference_2;
SELECT DISTINCT preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT MIN(customer_id) FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT SUM(customer_id) FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_3 IN ('value1', 'value2');
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY preference_1 DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_3 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 != preference_3;
SELECT customer_id, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 IS NOT NULL AND preference_3 LIKE 'value%';
SELECT customer_id, CONCAT(preference_1, ' ', preference_2) AS full_preference FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT AVG(customer_id) FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value' AND preference_2 = 'value';
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_1 NOT LIKE 'value%';
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_2 BETWEEN 'value1' AND 'value2';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = (SELECT MAX(customer_id) FROM CustomerPreferences);
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_3 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE preference_2 = (SELECT preference_2 FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 2);

SELECT customer_id, preferred_category FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1

SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_category, total_amount FROM customer_preferences JOIN purchase_history ON customer_preferences.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE total_amount < 500;
SELECT customer_id, device_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing';

SELECT customer_id, device_id, preferred_category, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customer_preferences JOIN purchase_history ON customer_preferences.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 500;
SELECT customer_id, device_id FROM customer_preferences WHERE preferred_category = 'Sports' OR preferred_category = 'Fitness';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 1;

SELECT customer_id, preferred_category, total_amount FROM customer_preferences JOIN purchase_history ON customer_preferences.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < (SELECT AVG(price) FROM products);
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount = (SELECT MAX(total_amount) FROM purchase_history);
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 100;

SELECT customer_id, device_id, preferred_category, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customer_preferences JOIN purchase_history ON customer_preferences.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE preferred_category = 'Books' AND total_amount < 1000;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = (SELECT MAX(customer_id) FROM customer_preferences);
SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM purchase_history;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price = (SELECT MIN(price) FROM products);

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM customer_preferences JOIN purchase_history ON customer_preferences.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM products JOIN purchase_history ON products.product_id = purchase_history.product_id;

SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing';

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, product_name, price FROM customer_preferences JOIN purchase_history ON customer_preferences.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id JOIN products ON purchase_history.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, product_name, price FROM customer_preferences JOIN purchase_history ON customer_preferences.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id JOIN products ON purchase_history.product_id = products.product_id WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_2 = 'value';
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = 'value' OR preference_3 = 'value';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(quantity) > 5;
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, ph.customer_id FROM products p JOIN purchase_history ph ON p.product_id = ph.product_id;
SELECT ph.purchase_id, ph.purchase_date, p.product_name, p.price FROM products p JOIN purchase_history ph ON p.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT customer_id, preference_1, p.product_name, p.price FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id;

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, SUM(price) AS total_spent FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, product_name, price, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY customer_id, product_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM purchase_history ph JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, purchase_date, p.product_name, p.price FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, p.product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY customer_id, product_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, p.product_name, category, price FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id WHERE category = 'Electronics';

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, p.product_name, category, price FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id WHERE preference_2 IS NULL;

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, p.product_name, category, price FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%value%';

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, purchase_date, p.product_name, category, price FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id WHERE preference_1 = 'value' AND category = 'Electronics';

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, purchase_date, p.product_name, category, price FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.price > 100;

SELECT customer_id, preference_1, purchase_date, p.product_name, category, price FROM customer_preferences cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VRGames WHERE genre = 'Action';

SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences JOIN PurchaseHistory ON CustomerPreferences.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 200;

SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT game_id, game_title FROM VRGames ORDER BY game_title ASC;
SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, vr_headset_preference FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE vr_headset_preference = 'Oculus Rift';
SELECT cp.customer_id, cp.vr_headset_preference, vh.headset_model FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN VRHeadsets vh ON cp.vr_headset_preference = vh.headset_model;
SELECT cp.customer_id, ph.total_amount FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id;
SELECT cp.customer_id, pg.game_title, pg.price FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN VRGames pg ON cp.vr_game_preference = pg.game_title;
SELECT cp.customer_id, cp.vr_game_preference, ph.total_amount FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.total_amount > 100;
SELECT cp.customer_id, cp.vr_headset_preference, vh.price FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN VRHeadsets vh ON cp.vr_headset_preference = vh.headset_model WHERE vh.price < 500;
SELECT cp.customer_id, pg.genre, ph.total_amount FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN VRGames pg ON cp.vr_game_preference = pg.game_title JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id;

SELECT cp.customer_id, pg.genre, ph.total_amount FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN VRGames pg ON cp.vr_game_preference = pg.game_title JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200
SELECT cp.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id GROUP BY cp.customer_id HAVING purchase_count > 2;
SELECT cp.customer_id, SUM(ph.total_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id GROUP BY cp.customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500;
SELECT cp.customer_id, AVG(ph.total_amount) AS avg_spent FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id GROUP BY cp.customer_id HAVING avg_spent < 50;
SELECT cp.customer_id, MAX(ph.total_amount) AS max_spent FROM CustomerPreferences cp JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON cp.customer_id = ph.customer_id GROUP BY cp.customer_id HAVING max_spent < 200;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT AVG(ph.total_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory;
SELECT MAX(ph.total_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM PurchaseHistory;
SELECT DISTINCT vr_headset_preference FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT * FROM ShoppingCart WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT brand, model FROM VRHeadsets WHERE price > 500;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_items FROM ShoppingCart GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(total_price) AS total_spent FROM ShoppingCart JOIN CustomerPreferences ON ShoppingCart.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_spent FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM CustomerPreferences;

SELECT customer_name, category, price FROM CustomerPreferences JOIN ProductCatalog ON CustomerPreferences.preferred_category = ProductCatalog.category AND CustomerPreferences.preferred_brand = ProductCatalog.brand;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT preferred_category) AS total_categories FROM CustomerPreferences GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS total_products FROM ShoppingCart GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory JOIN CustomerPreferences ON PurchaseHistory.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM ShoppingCart;
SELECT brand, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM VRHeadsets GROUP BY brand HAVING avg(price) > 300;
